frontmatter.title: Processing shift-tab (backtab) events in NSTextView
frontmatter.staticPreview: I'm writing a Mac App which includes an NSTextView. One of the things I found difficult to discover online is how to respond to when the user presses shift-tab while editing in the text view - I wanted to intercept this event to de-indent a list item...
frontmatter.mdxPreview: I'm writing a [Mac App](https://twitter.com/noahsark769/status/1137425513402658816?s=20) which includes an `NSTextView`. One of the things I found difficult to discover online is how to respond to when the user presses shift-tab while editing in the text view - I wanted to intercept this event to de-indent a list item...
